metadata.title: CVE-2024-0567 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
A vulnerability was found in GnuTLS, where a cockpit (which uses gnuTLS)rejects a certificate chain with distributed trust. This issue occurs whenvalidating a certificate chain with cockpit-certificate-ensure. This flawallows an unauthenticated, remote client or attacker to initiate a denialof service attack.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-0567` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gnutls-bin - 3.7.3-4ubuntu1.4
guile-gnutls - 3.7.3-4ubuntu1.4
libgnutls-dane0 - 3.7.3-4ubuntu1.4
libgnutls-openssl27 - 3.7.3-4ubuntu1.4
libgnutls30 - 3.7.3-4ubuntu1.4
libgnutlsxx28 - 3.7.3-4ubuntu1.4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: gnutls28 package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.7.3-4ubuntu1.4').
